data.prayer: Father, help the 100 believers in Gafsa to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 337,200 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gafsa, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Gafsa, Tunisia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Gafsa, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gafsa, Tunisia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Amazigh, Djerba people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Amazigh, Djerba people.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Gafsa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Gafsa, Tunisia to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Gafsa, Tunisia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
